data.text: Obiara a ɔpɛ ahohyɛsoɔ no pɛ nimdeɛ,
Onipa pa nya Awurade nkyɛn adom,
Amumuyɛsɛm rentumi mma onipa ase ntim,
Ɔyere a ɔwɔ suban pa yɛ ne kunu ahenkyɛ,
Teneneefoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ yɛ pɛ,
Amumuyɛfoɔ nsɛm da hɔ twɛn mogya,
Wɔtu amumuyɛfoɔ gu na wɔyera,
Wɔkamfo onipa sɛdeɛ ne nyansa teɛ
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ wo ho sɛ ɔteta a nso wowɔ ɔsomfoɔ,
Ɔteneneeni ma nʼayɛmmoa deɛ wɔpɛ,
Deɛ ɔyɛ nʼasase so adwuma no bɛnya aduane bebree,
Amumuyɛfoɔ pɛ abɔnefoɔ afodeɛ,
Ɔbɔnefoɔ anosɛm yi no sɛ afidie,
Nneɛma pa firi onipa anomu aba mu hyɛ no ma
Ɔkwasea akwan tene wɔ nʼani so,
Ɔkwasea bo nkyɛre fu,
Ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ di adanseɛ turodoo,
Nsɛm hunu keka wowɔ te sɛ akofena
Ano a ɛka nokorɛ no tim hɔ daa,
Nnaadaa hyɛ wɔn a wɔdwene bɔne ho akoma mu,
Ɔhaw biara rento ɔteneneeni,
Awurade kyiri ano a ɛtwa atorɔ,
Ɔnifirafoɔ mmɔ ne nimdeɛ ho dawuro
Nsa a ɛyɛ adwuma no bɛdi tumi,
Akoma a ɛpere adeɛ ho ma onipa boto,
Ɔteneneeni wɔ ntoboaseɛ wɔ ayɔnkofa mu,
Onihafoɔ ntoto ne hanam,
Tenenee kwan mu wɔ nkwa;
